pageProduct.name: Penta-Vite Childrens Liquid 100mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pentavite® Multivitamin + Iron Kids Liquid contains a combination of vitamins together with added iron to assist with the healthy growth and development of children from 1 up to 12 years.

In conjunction with a healthy diet, Pentavite® Multivitamin + Iron Kids Liquid can help support vitamin and iron levels in the body. 
  • No added sugar 
  • No added artificial colours  
  • No added dairy 
  • No added gluten 
  • No added fructose 
Dedicated to Children's Health

Suitable For: Kids 1-12 years

Product Claims: Supports healthy growth and development.

Size: 100mL

Dermatologist Tested?: n/a

Dermatologically Tested?: n/a

Soap-Free?: n/a

SPF: n/a

Alcohol Free?: No

KEY FEATURES

• Supports healthy growth and development
• Maintains energy levels
• Maintains healthy immune system function
• Helps supports vitamin and iron levels in the body
• Supports general health and wellbeing

Warnings

Contains sorbates and 2.2 g sorbitol per 5 mL dose. Products containing sorbitol may have a laxative effect or cause diarrhoea. Contains saccharin sodium. Do not use if seal around cap is broken or missing.

Ingredients

Contains: Each dose contains:
Vitamin B1 (Thiamine Hydrochloride): 3.5mL (1-3 yrs): 1.8mg, 5mL (4-12 yrs): 2.5mg.

Vitamin B2 (Riboflavine) (from riboflavine sodium phosphate 500 microgram/mL): 3.5mL (1-3 yrs): 1.3mg, 5mL (4-12 yrs): 1.8mg.

Vitamin B3 (Nicotinamide): 3.5mL (1-3 yrs): 10.5mg, 5mL (4-12 yrs): 15mg.

Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine) (from pyridoxine hydrochloride 150 microgram/mL): 3.5mL (1-3 yrs): 432µg, 5mL (4-12 yrs): 617µg.

Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid): 3.5mL (1-3 yrs): 42mg, 5mL (4-12 yrs): 60mg.

Vitamin D3 (Colecalciferol): 3.5mL (1-3 yrs): 3.5µg, 5mL (4-12 yrs): 5µg.

Iron (as Ferric Chloride Hexahydrate 3.48 mg/mL): 3.5mL (1-3 yrs): 2.5mg, 5mL (4-12 yrs): 3.6mg.

Directions

Pentavite® Multivitamin + Iron Kids Liquid is recommended for children over 12 months of age.

USAGE ADVICE

Do not shake. Use within 9 weeks of opening.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store upright below 25°C. Refrigerate after opening. Secure bottle cap tightly.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
